subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: ABPA does not belong to any other association.
goals__remit: ABPA is a non-profit organization composed of the Brazilian producers and exporters of poultrymeat, pigmeat and eggs. ABPA has 140 members and works for the continuous development of its industries, ensuring their quality and assisting them in reaching new markets.
position: Director Alonso&Asociados - ABPA´s Representative in the EU
